name: multiscale

effect.x-y: This Pokémon takes half as much damage when it is hit having full HP.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: This Pokémon takes half as much damage when it is hit having full HP.

short_effect: Halves damage taken from full HP.

flavor_text.x-y: Reduces damage the Pokémon takes when its HP is full.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Reduces the damage taken by the Pokémon when its HP is full.
